Upating children for the root element in a viewer can fail if the viewer input is set to null while the update is running asynchronously. In this case IViewerUpdate.getElement(TreePath) can return null.

Updated viewer requests to use element paths (since JFace viewers now support the use of the empty path to refer to the root element).
